content.html: I'm with Kevin on this one: the previous behaviour - where deleted tweets would no longer be upgraded by the JavaScript but instead fell back to being unstyled blockquotes - was a smart piece of archive friendly API design I'm going to have to stop using the JS now, which is sad
content.value:
I'm with Kevin on this one: the previous behaviour - where deleted tweets would no longer be upgraded by the JavaScript but instead fell back to being unstyled blockquotes - was a smart piece of archive friendly API design

I'm going to have to stop using the JS now, which is sad
